extensionDescription.message: 复制 URL 到剪贴板，支持 HTML, Markdown, 纯文本等多种格式。

optionsEnableAsciiDocDetail.message: Show AsciiDoc menu item in the context menu.

optionsEnableBBCodeTextDetail.message: Show BBCode (Text) menu item in the context menu.

optionsEnableBBCodeURLDetail.message: Show BBCode (URL) menu item in the context menu.

optionsEnableHtmlDetail.message: Show HTML menu item in the context menu.

optionsEnableMarkdownDetail.message: Show Markdown menu item in the context menu.

optionsEnableTextDetail.message: Show Text menu item in the context menu.

optionsEnableTextileDetail.message: Show Textile menu item in the context menu.

optionsHtmlOutputDetail.message: Choose whether to paste as plain text or as a hyperlink.

optionsHtmlOutputLabel.message: When creating an HTML formatted URL, paste it as:

optionsIconDetail2.message: “自动” 只适用 Firefox 57 或更新版本，同时需要在 "about:config" 中手动将 "svg.context-properties.content.enabled" 调整为 "true"。

optionsPromptContent.message: 复制时提示编辑链接标题

optionsPromptContentDetail.message: 允许从右键菜单复制链接时修改链接信息

optionsTitle.message: 复制链接到剪切板 - 设置
